text: Lelo Batisheba nakaluta kulongasa na mndewa Solomoni kwa chiwalo cha Adoniya. Mndewa nakenuka nakaluta kumbochela mayake, nakafugama, hamba nakekalisa kuli chigoda cha heye cha undewa. Nakalajiza chigoda cha undewa chigaligwe kwa heye kwa chiwalo cha mayake, naye mayake nakekalisa kuli moko wa kudilo wa mndewa.
